changes: Fix: PRs page weight's not displaying properly.
Fix: Backup code can now be copied on all devices (hopefully).
Text can no longer be selected in order to enhance the native experience.
PRs: Specify what rep count pr is being displayed.
Settings: On devices with clipboard permissions, the code is now displayed to be copied.
Add option to copy backup code.
News: Changed the background of news items to be darker.
PRs: Make movement title more pronounced.
PRs: Change movement button width sizing.
PRs: Update movement button border color.
PRs: Fix flash of white due to missing content.
Movement: Style back button to feel more fitting.
Movement: Added cancel button to movement PR log.
Movement: Fix the wrong rep count being displayed below movement title.
Movement: Barbell weight can now be changed in the plate calculator page.
Settings: Fixed settings flashing when opened.
Added plate calculator button to custom percentage.
Added a background to the plate explanation section.
Navigation sliding animations are now slightly shorter.
Add service worker and registration.
Offline support
Add bottom margin to create movement button.
Remove unneeded css.
Make Web Manifest use relative paths.
Disable overscroll
Remove highlight on webkit.
Fix import backup button size.
Remove unused and deprecated features.
Use hardcoded Web Manifest, should fix a few styling issues.
Add notifier to news link for when something new is released.
Fix(?) the input sizing issues on chrome.
Add custom percentage input.
Adjust navigation sizing to fit better on mobile.
Remove unused sidebar element.
Fix app freezing when rounding set to '2.5'
Fix Percentage table not showing correct barbell weight.
Move nav up so it won't be hidden on ios.
UI Overhaul with the intention of feeling more like a native app.
